response.answer_text: I am complicated. I am a short girl with lots of issues. I am a former foster child and now adopted child. I am almost a legal adult who is scared of being on my own and fully responsible for myself. I am stunted mentally. Sometimes I act like a little kid and will throw fits. This is because my brain hasn’t fully grown and developed to be where it should be completely due to my past traumatic experiences. I play mind games with myself and my mom even when I don't mean to. At times I will hate her and push her away, and other times I will need her desperately and be super sweet. I am overweight with low self esteem. I am not dumb, but I am also not smart. I am a big sister to two sisters. I love both of them, but I have a stronger devotion to my youngest sister because she is so young, beautiful and innocent. The other one I still love, but she went with me through foster care and experienced the abuse with me so we take out our anger on each other and sometimes abuse each other (mostly with our words). We always make up, but I hate it. I am not respected by anyone. To everyone else, I am a joke which infuriates me. I am someone who wants to be taken seriously. I am a hopeless romantic who has never had a someone else, but I am waiting patiently for my “one true love”. I have anger issues and a nasty temper, but only with my family. I have no issues outside of my home. I am a good student. I am lonely because I have no real close friends. I would be the bestest best friend to whoever would want me. I am understanding and empathetic to those who are broken and hurting. I am a strong willed, but passionate person who’s only dream is to help people. At times, I am shallow and desire popularity or fame. But other times I look into the deeper meaning of life and only desire to be happy in my lifetime. I am unstable emotionally and am determined to be the best freaking mom to my future kids one day. I am someone who lost my child innocence too early and put on a hard exterior in order to protect myself. I am judgmental of others and hypocritical. I don’t even know myself or understand why I do things the way I do. I am complicated.

Let me describe myself  in office on Diwali I am fairly easy going. I am willing to help anyone at any time. I do not like to be taken advantage of.I would say to a stranger that I am friendly but not stupid. I would also say that I am a learner and always want to be improving or learning more about things. Lastly, I would say that I’m quiet in a crowd but not when I am one on one with people.I have good leadership qualities and am confident of myself. I’m able to keep a calm and level head whenever I am in situations of stress.I would like to consider myself someone who can relate to anyone and any culture and background. It allows me to make very personal connections with everyone I meet.I am a kind-hearted caring individual that looks out for others. I try to help in any way possible and I am always looking out for my family. I have a good view on life and I am the happiest I have ever beenI am a very happy and compassionate person. I enjoy sharing things and talking to people about a variety of things.I have a quick wit and love to laugh about everything under the sun. I can be quiet at first, but once you get to know me, I don’t shut up. I am fun loving, but serious when necessary.I have a logical mind but understand and feel emotions as well.I am a calm and reserved person. That said, I would not pay special attention to a stranger. At moments, I would rather ignore the being of a stranger and do my own thing.I’m a hard working person who doesn’t like to give up. I strive for what I want and keep my goals in mind 24/7. This allows me to see exactly what I want and plan on how I will get it.I’m efficient and highly organized. This ensures that I am as productive as possible on the job. Second from the Left with team "I am someone who is mature, candid and who has integrity. Every day I work to improve myself and my skills which is part of maturing and becoming better at what I do."I am a trustworthy, honest, and humble person. I am very meticulous with my work and I work very hard. I love to be sociable and I am described as a calm and relax person."I am modest, but hard working and I consistently sets firm goals for myself. Then, once I've defined the benchmarks, I take the necessary steps to achieve those milestones."
